body_html:
@jsimsa Thanks very much for your detailed comments, which are really helpful! This PR has been revised. Could you have a look at the revisions?

For the comments about changing the existing code (e.g. variable names and iterator construction) in list_files_dataset_op_test.py, may I submit another PR and also add a benchmark test to list_files_dataset_op_test.py?

body:
@jsimsa Thanks very much for your detailed comments, which are really helpful! This PR has been revised. Could you have a look at the revisions?

For the comments about changing the existing code (e.g. variable names and iterator construction) in `list_files_dataset_op_test.py`, may I submit another PR and also add a benchmark test to `list_files_dataset_op_test.py`?
